title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 390.1 - Definite award required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 390.1 - Definite award required

State Regulations
(a) No
award shall be made for a lump-sum payment on account of all, or any part, of
the remaining compensation due any claimant, unless a definite award has
previously been made to such claimant. (b) By a definite award is meant an award in
which compensation payments terminate at a definite date or in the event of
death or remarriage of such claimant. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
390.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
